related_topics.description: A is the main playable character from nostAlgic, a fangame of Yume Nikki. A is usually characterized by yellow hair that covers eyes, green top with a red capital letter "A", blue bottom, and brown shoes.

Me (め; eye - pronounced as "may" or "meh" ) is the main character of Me.

Me speaks very little in the game, mostly to make a point or describe something. M-256's artworks of her frequently display her smiling, though it has to be noted that the smile she wears is not necessarily happy or friendly.

In her official ask blog, Me displays signs of affection to Yuukoto, seems to be in somewhat bad terms with Thomas, and appears to endure her insanity and refrains from going outside her apartment. She is also shown to have a high tolerance towards blood and gore, as she seems to be used to it. She also has a tolerance towards pain, both physical and emotional

In the "dream" world, she seems to go to areas that resemble either parts of herself, memories of her past and other things. Most of the starting worlds are somewhat light or relaxing, but the deeper worlds become more dark and disturbing. 

There are many motifs about body horror, eyes and plants in Me.

Cripple-tan (or Aojiru/Aoshiru) is a patient in the Hospital, shown with bandages around his head, wearing a buttoned shirt, and hooked up to an IV. The green substance being fed through the IV seems to be the same one that oozes from the bed in the event that takes you to his room. (https://yume2kki.fandom.com/wiki/Cripple-Tan)

Cripple-tan sits in this room beside the bed and reacts to nothing. Trying to interact with them will automatically make Urotsuki kill him with the Chainsaw, even if you haven't collected it.

Cripple-tan can also be seen sleeping in this room when Urotsuki equips the Chainsaw and looks out of The Monster's Jaw in Forest World.

A deity figure from Marijuana Goddess World, Stepping on the flashing red tile on the idol’s forehead will activate a full-screen event where a moving image of the figure will zoom in and out while upbeat music plays.
(https://yume2kki.fandom.com/wiki/Events )

Smile-San is found in Flying Fish World. He is in the doorway that is boarded up so you need to chainsaw the boards to get in. If you use the Telephone effect on him, his laughs will be played overlapping one another at different speeds.  Waking yourself up will cause one final laugh. Using the Rainbow effect will also shut him up. (https://yume2kki.fandom.com/wiki/Minor_Characters)

A fox-masked man in a colorful yukata that can be found in the Invisible Maze and the Baddies Bar (possibly implying that he's an enemy). If you move in the direction he's facing when you're in the black and white part of the maze it will lead you to the Invisible effect. If you try and chainsaw him, he'll leap behind you to avoid your slash. Sometimes, he'll attack you and send you to a closed off area, like a Chaser, which could explain why he's in the Baddies Bar. (https://yume2kki.fandom.com/wiki/Minor_Characters)

Sabitsuki (さびつき Sabitsuki?) is the main character of .flow, controlled by the player. She is a mysterious, seemingly ill girl secluded in her bedroom, with nothing to do but play Shinsoku Neko or enter flow in search of 24 effects.

After collecting and dropping all 24 effects, Sabitsuki is replaced as the player character by Rust. (https://dotflow.fandom.com/wiki/Sabitsuki)

Theories:
- It is theorized that Sabitsuki is slowly losing her mind either from the disease or from side effect of her treatments.
- Sabitsuki possibly didn't fit in much at school and was either widely ignored or made fun of. Support for this theory comes from that going through the Corrupted School Kaibutsu will actively chase you with pipes as their laughter fills the halls.
- It is possible that Sabitsuki is being quarantined due to the disease she has.

Oreko (オレ子 Oreko?) is a small, barefoot girl wearing an orange diving helmet found in the Submarine World. When interacted with, she gives Sabitsuki the Diving Helmet effect. In the Submarine World, she is found either inside her house, working on a large, mysterious machine, in which case she is uninteractable, or walking around inside or outside. 

When playing as Rust, Oreko disappears from the Submarine World, and the younger version of her in the Hospital dies. She remains in her tube in the Industrial Maze, and can be encountered in an event that takes place in the Deadhole. Here, a shadowy Oreko will slowly walk to the bottom before vanishing.

Fans speculate that Oreko could be someone that Sabitsuki somewhat knew in the hospital, and was also her first friend based on the version we see of her in the hospital.
There is another theory going that Oreko also could've possibly been Sabitsuki's imaginary friend when she was little.
(https://dotflow.fandom.com/wiki/Oreko)

Rust (錆 Sabi) is the second player character of .flow, available after collecting and dropping all 24 effects in the first half of the game. Whether Rust is some other form of Sabitsuki or another entity altogether is unknown. Unlike Sabitsuki, Rust cannot use effects, but she can access previously inaccessible areas to collect Empty Boxes and achieve the game's True Ending. (https://dotflow.fandom.com/wiki/Rust)

While playing as Rust, the world undergoes many small changes, certain events become available while others are lost, and the Kaibutsu are replaced by Fetuses.

Nire (にれ) is the protagonist of Yuque. She lives in a small apartment and refuses to leave her room for unknown reasons. The menu notes that she has Somniphobia. (https://yumenikkifg.fandom.com/wiki/Nire_(にれ))

Little can be said about Nire's personality as she does not talk in the game. What type of personality she has is left to the player's interpretation.

The menu mentioning her as somniphobic means that she fears falling asleep, although it is not yet known why or how this fear developed.

Usotsuki (うそつき; meaning "liar") is the only playable character in Yume Nisshi. When she isn't sleeping, she sits idly in her room with only books and a radio to entertain her. Though she never speaks, her dream world provides clues as to what may be going on in her life, as well as her personality. (https://yumenisshi.fandom.com/wiki/Usotsuki)

Usotsuki is depicted most of the time as a sweet little girl, but with also a rather violent and mischievous side, possibly because she has such a brutal weapon (Nail bat), and to match her name (Liar). She may be quite sneaky or deceptive, and seems to enjoy getting into trouble (https://yumenikkifg.fandom.com/wiki/Usotsuki_(うそつき))

Not much is known about Usotsuki, but she seems to have a connection to antique-like things, and possibly churches. The game is still incomplete, so her full past has not been revealed yet.
